title: Bug 49299: Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 custom cookie name not affecting URL rewriting
description: Bug 49299: The Servlet 3.0 specification chapter 7.1.1 states that a custom cookie name should affect URL rewriting, but it does not.
OB: The custom cookie name mentioned in chapter 7.1.1 of the Servlet 3.0 specification does not have any effect on URL rewriting. When accessing the Reload link, the default 'jsessionid' is used in the URL instead of the expected custom cookie name.
EB: Expected result: If the phrase in 7.1.1 of the Servlet 3.0 specification is followed, the Reload link should have the custom cookie name in the URL instead of the default 'jsessionid'. The expected URL for the Reload link should be 'http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F'.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Deploy the attached war file named 'cookiename.war'.
2. Access 'http://localhost:8080/cookiename/'.
3. Click on the 'Reload' link.
